content.prompt: The influence of different stylistic traditions that can be seen in the Treasury of Petra reflects the

choices.label: central role that long-distance trade played in Nabataean society, resulting in exposure to other cultures
vast reach of the Nabataean Empire, which united various countries that had different traditions
repeated conquest of the Nabataeans by different cultures, resulting in the adoption of foreign traditions
adoption of a new religious belief system by the Nabataeans, resulting in the replacement of older traditions
